# PaymentMethodChangeEvent

**Class**

The Apple Pay extensions to the Payment Request payment change event.

## Declaration

```swift
interface PaymentMethodChangeEvent
```

## Overview

The Payment Request API sends a [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/PaymentMethodChangeEvent] when the user updates transaction information. For more information on [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/PaymentMethodChangeEvent], see the [https://www.w3.org/TR/payment-request/#paymentmethodchangeevent-interface].

### Apple Pay Events

Custom Apple Pay events include information in the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/PaymentMethodChangeEvent/methodDetails] attribute of the change event:



## Change Information

- **methodName**: The identifier for the payment method to use for the transaction.
- **methodDetails**: A dictionary that contains the details of the change.

## Related Documentation

- **ApplePayPaymentMethod**: A dictionary that describes an Apple Pay payment method.

## Respond to payment request change events

- **ApplePayCouponCodeDetails**: A dictionary that contains the updated coupon code.
